text: @NikkiHaley Isn't it amazing that murders are up while @realDonaldTrump is in office? But not surprising considering he dog whistles to his violent NRA base every chance he gets. And don't forget Trump himself is responsible for 136,000 deaths from #COVID19.  #TrumpIsKillingUs
